CHAT.comment: tape 17.2a; Saturday night at home on Spencer Street

u.a: 2 clunks; 6 sec silence , rustles , plastic clatter
his word for tape; 0.8 sec , then they speak together
5.1 sec , D rapidly flicks the switch two times

D puts S down; 3 sec mostly silence , someone shouts at 1:35 - sounds like it is outside
13.5 sec silence , S crawls , laughs , rattles , D coughs
1 sec , then D speaks and clicks at the same time
4.5 sec , D clicks switch on and off rapidly , twice , silence
D puts him down; 8 sec , hollow sounds from cup
20 sec clatter of toy , clunky sounds , rattle
D's eventcasting is overlapped by clatter

8 sec; S crawls to the basket
growly voice , S squeals with laughter
effort in his voice; 2.4 sec , then S coos
10.5 sec , panting as S tries to get up on bed
D bounces S on bed; S giggles
whispered; 0.8 sec , S giggles during the bouncing till 7:46
2 sec , more bouncing , S murmurs and D laughs
S vocalizes as D bounces him
door shuts , 14 sec silence while D looks in fridge

imploded , one of his animal sounds
echoing S , but not imploding it; 2.7 sec , S laughs

6 sec crawling , then buzz of S's Busy Box

simultaneous buzz; 11 sec silence and S crawling

4.5 sec , silence , then S hoots again for 3 sec 14:16-18
5 sec silence , then S hoots again at 15:08-9 followed by silence
2.7 sec silence , then they speak together

growly , S giggles; D kisses him

loud growly whisper , S laughs then silence; 4.3 sec
1.7 sec , S laughs , then D does
almost drowned out by S laughing
2.5 sec , door closes , music from outside
34 sec , S crawls away; outside music , rustles and clicks
S vocalizes at the same time
3 sec , moving around; S does it
S crawls away , in the middle D softly says

15 sec; S crawls , silence , rustles , click , bouncing sounds
5 sec , soft rustles , then they speak together

rough growly voice , more growls and shrieks

the sound he makes when he's standing or walking
meaning he didn't throw it; 2.1 sec

37 sec silence outside radio , small noises of S pushing on scales , then crawling; D clears his throat , fart

1.2 sec , rustles , then they speak together
